io.mosip.registration.dao

Interface UserDetailDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UserDetailDAOImpl

    public interface UserDetailDAO
    This class is used to get respective user details by providing their id from UserDetail table. This class is used to update the login parameters of the user, get the list of user specific biometric details by by passing user id and bio type, get all the active users by passing attribute code, get user specific biometric details by passing user id, bio type and sub type. This class is used to save the user detail response to UserDetail table.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Sravya Surampalli

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<UserBiometric> getAllActiveUsers(String attrCode)
      This method is used to gets the all active users by passing the attrCode as parameter.
      UserDetail getUserDetail(String userId)
      This method is used to get the User Details by passing user id as parameter from UserDetail table.
      UserBiometric getUserSpecificBioDetail(String userId, String bioType, String subType)
      This method is used to get the user specific bio details by passing user, bioType and sub type as parameters.
      List<UserBiometric> getUserSpecificBioDetails(String userId, String bioType)
      This method is used to gets the user specific bio details by passing user and bioType as parameters.
      void save(UserDetailResponseDto userDetailsResponse)
      This method is used to save the user details response to the UserDetail table.
      void updateLoginParams(UserDetail userDetail)
      This method is used update login params by passing the user detail as parameter.

    • Method Detail

      • getUserDetail

        UserDetail getUserDetail(String userId)
        This method is used to get the User Details by passing user id as parameter from UserDetail table.
        Parameters:
        userId - id of the user
        Returns:
        UserDetail based on the userId

      • updateLoginParams

        void updateLoginParams(UserDetail userDetail)
        This method is used update login params by passing the user detail as parameter.
        Parameters:
        userDetail - user details

      • getAllActiveUsers

        List<UserBiometric> getAllActiveUsers(String attrCode)
        This method is used to gets the all active users by passing the attrCode as parameter.
        Parameters:
        attrCode - the attr code
        Returns:
        the all active users

      • getUserSpecificBioDetails

        List<UserBiometric> getUserSpecificBioDetails(String userId,
                                              String bioType)
        This method is used to gets the user specific bio details by passing user and bioType as parameters.
        Parameters:
        userId - the user id
        bioType - the bio type
        Returns:
        the list of user specific biometric details

      • getUserSpecificBioDetail

        UserBiometric getUserSpecificBioDetail(String userId,
                                       String bioType,
                                       String subType)
        This method is used to get the user specific bio details by passing user, bioType and sub type as parameters.
        Parameters:
        userId - the user id
        bioType - the bio type
        subType - the bio subtype
        Returns:
        the user specific biometric details

      • save

        void save(UserDetailResponseDto userDetailsResponse)
        This method is used to save the user details response to the UserDetail table.
        Parameters:
        userDetailsResponse - the user details response
